name: Tears of Fate [EARLY ALPHA]
description:
Little Unity Project.  Just few simple rooms generated from 2 presets and 3 random enemies. WASD for movement MouseClick to attack.

Alt+F4 to close.

Music "A Darkness Opus" by Alexander Zhelanov

Some sound effects from OpenGameArt

Windows ONLY.

PS: It is possible to walk into the void. If you die the game reloads.
